description.displayText:
I've known Triona for over 15 years and in that time frame, I've seen her serve the church, be a Girl Scout leader, work various jobs, and excelled at being a VBS camp counselor while volunteering countless hours in her community throughout the years. 

Triona is very industrious and a self starter. She has worked many jobs including a youth summer camp before working as an After School aide under my supervision.  In this role, Triona prepared and lead craft activities for students in grades K-8.  On Halloween, she dressed in costume making students smile as she played with them. 

I could always depend and rely on Triona for addressing student individual needs while ensuring their safety.
description.originalText:
I've known Triona for over 15 years and in that time frame, I've seen her serve the church, be a Girl Scout leader, work various jobs, and excelled at being a VBS camp counselor while volunteering countless hours in her community throughout the years. 

Triona is very industrious and a self starter. She has worked many jobs including a youth summer camp before working as an After School aide under my supervision.  In this role, Triona prepared and lead craft activities for students in grades K-8.  On Halloween, she dressed in costume making students smile as she played with them. 

I could always depend and rely on Triona for addressing student individual needs while ensuring their safety.
